lead_paragraph: Wall Street has always loved the fees generated by deal-crazy oil companies, Breakingviews says. But the recent flurry of activity in the energy industry — $130 billion so far this year and counting — is once again making them the most valuable clients for the world’s merger advisers, the publication says.

headline.main: With Oil Deals, Merger Advisers Rejoice
